summary: Riverwood Overlook is a player housing, lore friendly, mod placed shortly east of Riverwood itself. Great for starting or role players. Accompanied with two chairs and beds for you and your companion, food, starting items/weapons.
descriptionHtml:
Name: Riverwood Overlook
Version: 1.1
Date: 2/11/2012
Category: Player Housing
Author: Roughnecks
Source: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8930

*Attention*
---------------------
V1.1 is up and in order to successfully acquire the cavern, you must find the key off of Benkum Omen (Deceased). Someone in town mentioned seeing a body floating from the mill wheel and was heading downstream.

Description
===========
Riverwood Overlook is a player housing, lore friendly, mod placed shortly east of Riverwood itself. Great for starting or role players. Accompanied with two chairs and beds for you and your companion, food, starting items/weapons.

Location
========
Up the path of Riverwood\'s east \"gate\".

Details
=======
- Two entrances, one at the base of the cliff and a one that leads to a nice balcony/overlook of Riverwood and beyond, hence the title.
- Fully navameshed interior.
- Two chairs and bedrolls for you and your companion.
- Cooking spit.
- Stocked with reasonable amount of food.
- Barrels/chests don\'t respawn.
- Appropriately lite.
- Great for starting characters, role players, those who love Riverwood.
- Unmaked Quest

Install
=======
1. Extract the files to a temporary location.
2. Examine the folder structure and make corrections where necessary.
3. Copy files to Steam\\SteamApps\\Common\\\\Skyrim\\Data\\
4. Start Skyrim Launcher, click \'Data Files\', place a checkmark beside the .esp file(s).
5. (Optional) If you use Nexus Mod Manager, load that up and place a checkmark by Riverwood Overlook.esp

Uninstall
=========
1. Start Skyrim Launcher, click Data Files, uncheck the .esp file(s). (Or NMM)
2. Delete the files/folders associated with the mod: Riverwood Overlook.esp



Incompatibility
===============
None currently.

Known Issues or Bugs
====================
None currently.

History
=======
1.1, 2/11/12 - Fixed some clipping in the cavern, added an unmarked quest and to enter the cavern now requires a key of the dead Benkum Omen.
1.0, 2/11/12 - Initial release.

Contact
=======

You can find me on the official Bethsoft forums as Roughnecks
You can find me on TESNexus as Roughnecks2277


Credits
=======

Thanks to Bethesda for creating Skyrim and the Creation Kit.
Thanks to Skyrim.Nexus.com for the a one-stop-shop resource for authors and players.
Thanks to LHammonds for the Readme Generator this file was based on.


Tools Used
==========
7-Zip - http://www.tesnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=15579
Readme Generator - http://HammondsLegacy.com/obmm/tools_readme_generator1.asp
Creation Kit

Licensing/Legal
===============
You must contact me and obtain my permission before re-packaging any part of
this mod. 

RECOMMENDED MODS:

NMM - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/content/modmanager/

Realistic Lighting With Customization - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7654

Sounds of Skyrim - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8601

Realistic Smoke and Embers - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=836

RWT Realistic Water Textures - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=711

Natural Skyrim Rain - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8395

SkyUI - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3863
author: Roughnecks
